about_the_game:
Dive into the captivating world of Murder at The Florian!

This game has been created with real actors who bring captivating characters to life. This innovative experience transports you into the mysterious universe of an enigmatic murder.

Get ready to embark on an exciting adventure as you embody Coralie, a determined investigator out to prove herself.
In this captivating detective game, you explore the various dialogue screens between characters to interrogate witnesses and suspects. Your goal is to uncover hidden clues and select insightful questions to unravel the mystery surrounding the murder. Each dialogue choice brings you one step closer to the truth in this immersive crime-solving experience.


Picture yourself at the crime scene, in a 1950s bar, on the very day of Nicolas Verrière's birthday. Suspense is at its peak as you navigate through carefully concealed clues and captivating twists. Each video you uncover brings you closer to the truth, but beware, appearances can be deceiving.

Murder at The Florian offers you the opportunity to play at your own pace. Dive in solo for a total immersion in this captivating plot, or share the experience with your friends on Twitch by inviting them to participate in every crucial decision.

This is a passionate work, lovingly created in 3 months by a team of dedicated enthusiasts. With your financial contribution (if you wish), together we can elevate this amateur gaming experience to new heights. Your support will enable us to craft an even better experience for the next challenge we undertake...

content_descriptors.notes:
Adult Content Warning - Murder at the Florian

Dear players,

We want to inform you that Murder at the Florian contains content intended for a mature audience. This includes a scene of violence, an artistic representation of a female posterior, and there is a corpse (related to the investigation theme). These elements are presented within a narrative context but may not be suitable for all players. Please take this into consideration before playing.

Nikoballz
